Vor der Oberbürgermeister-Wahl in Ulm: Before the Mayor election in Ulm
Bei der Oberbürgermeisterwahl in Ulm am: The mayoral election in Ulm on December 2nd is expected to have a low voter turnout. Only 40 - 45% of eligible voters are currently planning to participate in the vote for the new mayor.
Dies ist das Ergebnis einer repräsentati: This is the result of a representative survey conducted by C.M.R. on behalf of Radio7.
Favorit unter den Kandidaten ist Ivo Gön: The favorite among the candidates is Ivo Gönner (SPD), the current mayor, who is running for a third term.
Von den Wählerinnen und Wählern, die sic: Of the voters who have already decided on a candidate, 86% would vote for Ivo Gönner.
Vor der Oberbürgermeisterwahl in Kaisers: Before the Mayor election in Kaiserslautern
Es wird spannend, wer nach der OB-Wahl a: It will be exciting to see who will take a seat in the town hall after the mayoral election on March 11th of this year. The incumbent mayor Bernhard Deubig (CDU), who has held office since 1999, faces a strong challenger in Klaus Weichel (SPD). As several surveys conducted by C.M.R. on behalf of RHEINPFALZ since July 2006 show, Klaus Weichel is ahead of the current mayor in voter favor.

Länderfusion im Südwesten der Republik: State merger in the southwest of the republic
Eine Fusion von Rheinland-Pfalz und dem: A merger of Rhineland-Palatinate and Saarland is not desired from the perspective of citizens, according to the results of a survey conducted by C.M.R. on behalf of RHEINPFALZ in Rhineland-Palatinate and Saarland. Only 40% of Rhineland-Palatinate residents and 31% of Saarland residents support a state merger. More information can be found here:
